name: New Heights (Duhndal)
description:
In New Heights the many floating islands a situated above a huge open sea, slowly rising, the only thing you have to escape drowning is a primitive hot air balloon, if you stay in one altitude for too long the water will catch up to you!

Interact with "hollowstones" on forest islands to fight enemies.

Controls & how to play:
W/A/S/D - Walk
Shift - Sprint
F - Interact
E - Open inventory
LMB - attack

Click on items in your inventory to equip or move them.
Right click to place placeable object (e.g. torch)

NOTE!
You are unable to craft the iron sword due to a bug
To play a version where this bug was fixed (48 minutes after deadline) click here:
https://gamejolt.com/games/NewHeights/644144
